title: T-Series Whatsapp Scam. Has anyone else received any similar message.
selftext:
So i just received a text today saying that i have to subscribe n like a T-Series video for which i will receive some money. I know it's a scam but went along with it as initially some scammers pay u  money.

https://preview.redd.it/rjtz9evn99ua1.png?width=1315&format=png&auto=webp&v=enabled&s=9137dcee3ac22d62073b71d48cb3c5099da49f3d

After i sent a screenshot to them they gave me a code, they told me visit their Telegram n submit the code there.

After doing that at telegram they r asking me name, age, gender n occupation.

​

https://preview.redd.it/kshb5ihoa9ua1.png?width=1215&format=png&auto=webp&v=enabled&s=3fda156d84b841c2d57b465792f55e3eff6f59fe

I would have gone further but i don't want to give my personal info to them.

Ik they already know my number n truecaller exists but still i don't want to do it myself.
comments: Give fake info for anything, either they check or they dont.
No. But one of my friend did this a legal way and he earned a bit good amount  atleast so much that he can afford tea and cigarettes for a week daily
NGL that was what i was hoping for, but they asked for my details n i noped the fuck out.
cleaned_text: tseries whatsapp scam anyone else received similar message received text today saying subscribe n like tseries video receive money know scam went along initially scammers pay u money sent screenshot gave code told visit telegram n submit code telegram r asking name age gender n occupation xb would gone dont want give personal info ik already know number n truecaller exists still dont want

After doing that at telegram they r asking me name, age, gender n occupation. ​ I would have gone further but i don't want to give my personal info to them.
